item.title: How Trump’s Venezuela raid could worsen America’s affordability crisis
item.description: A spike in diesel oil prices could make goods and materials more expensive to deliver — risking higher inflation.

item.title: ‘I’m on a fixed budget’: Silver and gold are too rich for my blood. What else can I gift my adorable grandchildren?
item.description: “I’ve already listed them as beneficiaries on my 401(k).”

item.title: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
item.description: “I’m almost 50 years old. Enough is enough. I am exhausted by it.”

item.title: Here are the most popular Moneyist columns of 2025
item.description: Bad executors, greedy friends, inheritances, elder abuse and qualifying for Medicaid featured as the most-read Moneyist columns of the year.

item.title: ‘I have absolutely no idea what to do’: I was diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and inherited $400K. How do I invest it?
